synopsis.text: This captivating clockpunk tale unfolds in a world where Earth has been reduced to a mechanical wonder, meticulously reconstructed by a legendary clockmaker known only as 'Y'. Naoto Miura, a struggling high school student with a knack for tinkering, finds his life taking an unexpected turn when he encounters RyuZU, an automaton crafted by 'Y', and Marie, a prodigious clockmaker. As they join forces, the trio embarks on a mission to mend the deteriorating 'Clockwork Planet'. Their journey is fraught with challenges and triumphs, as they strive to keep the intricate gears of their world turning. When the ordinary meets the extraordinary, the lines between reality and fantasy blur, and the stage is set for an adventure that could alter the course of their clockwork universe forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
